name: Sysinternals SDelete Delete File
description: Detects the use of SDelete to erase a file not the free space
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.original_file_name:sdelete.exe AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\ \-h* OR *\ \-c* OR *\ \-z* OR *\ \/\?*))))`
